dc_description_s: This Raster GeoTIFF represents Hudson River Valley Gap Analysis 30m Land Cover of for 1992-1993. This land cover data of the Hudson River Valley (New York) has a 30m pixel resolution, and was derived from Landsat-5 satellite imagery from 1992 and 1993. The Hudson River Valley GAP Analysis Project (HRV-GAP) uses the New York State GAP Analysis Project (NY-GAP) database to perform analyses and answer research questions directly related to the Hudson River Valley (HRV).
dc_title_s: Hudson River Valley Gap Analysis 30m Land Cover, 1992-1993
dct_spatial_sm: Hudson River, New York, United States
New York State, New York, United States
